segments.text: Look at that sweet scene in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are up to some mischief with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the boy is balancing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the jar, grabbing those treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently, her little hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Mom's busy drying dishes, totally oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's spilling from the sink, but it's kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's growing, soaking her shoe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window makes everything glow nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden out there is so tidy and green.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This reminds me of my own childhood cookie raids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it without a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR
